data.actual_result: It depends, I had two cases when testing: the center of the screen was empty with the "You're wieving old messages" bar or the messages in the channel where we post the link appear.
data.expected_result: The link shouldn't work, like a toast appear to say that the link doesn't work anymore or whatever.
data.short_description: Share a link of a message which it is in another channel then delete the message and click on the link make weird thing.
data.steps_to_repro: - Create a new channel or delete each messages in a channel (still work if the channel has a lot of messages, but it doesn't give the exact same result as in the video). - Post anything. - Copy the link of the message then send this link in another channel. - Delete the message. - Click on the link.
